extension.name: Hikashop - Product Cron Update
extension.author: HikaShop Team
extension.description: This plugin enables you to update products with a CSV file using a cron

param.name: path
param.label: File
param.description: Path to the CSV file to import

param.name: column_name
param.label: Column names
param.description: Column names and their correspondance into the database. It should be like that: old_column1_name:new_column1_name;old_column2_name:new_column2_name

param.name: charset
param.label: Charset
param.description: You can select here the charset of your CSV file

param.name: frequency
param.label: Frequency
param.description: Frequency at which the CSV file will be imported (in seconds)

param.name: last_cron_update
param.label: Last update
param.description: Last date on which the products were updated via the CRON task

param.name: fee
param.label: Prices fee
param.description: For each price in the feed, add a % fee

param.name: delete
param.label: Delete products not in the CSV
param.description: Delete products not in the CSV
